scripts.dev: npm run build-sdk && vite dev --mode lc --port 5001 --https --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.dev-clean: npm run clean-build && npm run build-sdk && vite dev --mode lc --port 5001 --https --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.build: npm run clean-build && npm run build-sdk && vite build --mode lc --force --emptyOutDir
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean-build && npm run build-sdk && vite build --mode dev --force --emptyOutDir
scripts.build-qa: npm run clean-build && npm run build-sdk && vite build --mode qa --force --emptyOutDir
scripts.build-uat: npm run clean-build && npm run build-sdk && vite build --mode uat --force --emptyOutDir
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean-build && npm run build-sdk && vite build --mode prod --force --emptyOutDir
scripts.format-code: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build-dev && mkdir -p node_modules/.cache/wrangler/ && cp pages-dev.json node_modules/.cache/wrangler/pages.json && wrangler pages deploy --branch main .svelte-kit/cloudflare
scripts.deploy-qa: npm run build-qa && mkdir -p node_modules/.cache/wrangler/ && cp pages-qa.json node_modules/.cache/wrangler/pages.json && wrangler pages deploy --branch main .svelte-kit/cloudflare
scripts.deploy-uat: npm run build-uat && mkdir -p node_modules/.cache/wrangler/ && cp pages-uat.json node_modules/.cache/wrangler/pages.json && wrangler pages deploy --branch main .svelte-kit/cloudflare
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build-prod && mkdir -p node_modules/.cache/wrangler/ && cp pages-prod.json node_modules/.cache/wrangler/pages.json && wrangler pages deploy --branch main .svelte-kit/cloudflare
